lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission on Wednesday sued the operators of the for-profit DeVry University, alleging they misled consumers about students’ job and earnings prospects.

headline.print_headline: DeVry University Accused of Misleading Students
headline.main: Devry University Accused of Misleading Students

snippet: The Federal Trade Commission on Wednesday sued the operators of the for-profit DeVry University, alleging they misled consumers about students’ job and earnings prospects.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission sues operators of for-profit institution DeVry University for providing misleading information to consumers about students’ job and earnings potential upon graduation; FTC chairwoman Edith Ramirez believes over 50,000 students were affected and may be eligible for monetary relief; parent company DeVry Education Group plans to contest claims.
